title: Have our planet and eat it too
brief_description: Shows controversy between a company in favour of open-pit mining on national forest land, and a community that opposes this land usage. Deals with the concern over changes in water, air, wildlife and vegetation, and the conflict between old mining laws, and the National Environmental Policy Act.
